about_the_game: FootballLife "is an immersive simulation game based on the player's first perspective. Players will play as a professional football player starting from the youth training camp, joining clubs, national teams, and competing in a series of events such as leagues, national cup competitions, intercontinental championship cup competitions, world championship cup competitions, intercontinental cup competitions, and world cup competitions. And players also need to handle various content outside of their own competitions, such as their emotions, finances, social interactions, marriage, life, and other main or unexpected situations. The game is a completely open world of free football, and various event data will be generated in real-time based on the attributes of all players. We look forward to you experiencing all the fun of being a professional football player from it.
